definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="VAR">global:StarPlatinumObtained</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:StarPlatinumUser</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> Is the Current User of Star
